mapper.select:
select * from app_vipcard
card_state =#{cardState}
and card_no like CONCAT('%','${cardNo}','%' )
and expiry_time IS NOT NULL
and dtflag=0 order by import_time desc
mapper.update: update app_vipcard set dtflag =1 where card_no =#{cardNo}
mapper.select: select * from app_vipcard where dtflag=0 order by import_time desc
mapper.sql: card_no, customer_id, init_money, remain_money, card_type, card_state, valide_time, active_time, nfc_id, dtflag, card_name
mapper.insert: insert into app_vipcard (card_no, customer_id, init_money, remain_money, card_type, card_state, valide_time, active_time, nfc_id, dtflag, card_name) values (#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remainMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{valideTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nfcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into app_vipcard
card_no,
customer_id,
init_money,
remain_money,
card_type,
card_state,
valide_time,
active_time,
nfc_id,
dtflag,
sale_time,
#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{initMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
#{remainMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
#{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update app_vipcard set
expiry_time = #{expiryTime} ,
active_time = #{activeTime} ,
sale_time=#{saleTime},
card_state=#{card_state},
card_no=#{cardNo} where card_no = #{cardNo}

update app_vipcard
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
init_money = #{initMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
remain_money = #{remainMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_state = #{cardState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
valide_time = #{valideTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nfc_id = #{nfcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_time= #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update app_vipcard set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, init_money = #{initMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, remain_money = #{remainMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_state = #{cardState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, valide_time = #{valideTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nfc_id = #{nfcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
